resources.string: This is a demo for NFC Host Card Emulation applicaiton, currently set to emulate loyalty cards, a request is sent to a web server for the account number which is returned and send to the reader.
This is a demo for NFC emulating a Secure Element applicaiton, currently set to emulate loyalty cards, the account number is retrieved from the memory within the device.

This is a demo NFC card reader, for reading cards that do not contain NDEF or Android Beam data. This demo disables Android Beam, and selects which AIDs the reader is interested in, and establish communication with the card.
